Table of Contents

Name

snapsym - symmetrize a snapshot

Synopsis

snapsym [parameter=value]

Description

snapsym symmetrizes a snapshot by placing each particular at a number of positions and velocities as described by the type of symmetry requested. This will increase the size of the snapshot N-fold, with a N-type symmetry.

Currently only a rotation-around-Z symmetry is supported, which means each particle is rotated through the 4 quadrants, plus mirrored in

Z

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized in any order if the keyword is also given:
in=
Input file name [???]
out=
Output file name [???]
mode=
Not implemented yet.

Examples

See Also

snapcopy(1NEMO) , snapsquash(1NEMO) , snapspin(1NEMO)

Files

src/nbody/trans

Author

Peter Teuben
